paragraph: CHAPTER XV. “WALLYPUG’S BLUSH LIMITED.”
“HOW do you do?” I began.
tokens: do begin

paragraph: The little fellow bowed and smiled and brought forth a scrap of paper and a pencil.
tokens: little fellow bow smile bring scrap paper pencil

paragraph: On the paper he wrote, “Quite well thanks, how are you?” and added the words, “Can I be of any service to you?”
tokens: paper write thanks add word service

paragraph: I pondered a moment, and then recollected that he would be a capital medium of communication between the Wallypug and myself.
tokens: ponder moment recollect capital medium communication

paragraph: “Do you know where the stocks are?” I inquired.
tokens: know stock inquire

paragraph: Mr. Nobody nodded vigorously.
tokens: nod

paragraph: “His Majesty the Wallypug is there,” I ventured.
tokens: venture

paragraph: Mr. Nobody nodded again very energetically, and I could see that he knew all about it. Moreover he wrote on his paper, “Poor Wallypug!” and looked most sympathetic.
tokens: nod see know write paper poor look sympathetic

paragraph: “Would you like to help him?” I inquired.
tokens: like help inquire

paragraph: The little man nodded again, and seemed quite delighted at the prospect.
tokens: little man nod seem delighted prospect

paragraph: Handing him the half of the Gombobble which I had reserved for his Majesty, I said, “Take this to the Wallypug immediately and, _if he is quite alone_, tell him to eat it all, and on no account to tell any one how he became possessed of it.”
tokens: hand half reserve say take alone_ tell eat account tell one become possess

paragraph: Mr. Nobody nodded to show that he understood, and, taking the piece of Gombobble, he squeezed through the bars of my cell, and was soon running off in the direction of the stocks.
tokens: nod show understand take piece squeeze bar cell run direction stock

paragraph: I awaited his return with some anxiety, and was delighted to see when he did come back, that his face was beaming with delight.
tokens: await return anxiety delighted see come face beam delight

paragraph: [MR. NOBODY NODDED.]
tokens: nodded

paragraph: “His Majesty has regained his complexion, and is very grateful to you,” he wrote hurriedly, clapping his hands and capering about.
tokens: regain complexion grateful write clap hand caper

paragraph: “Now go and tell Oom Hi and the Kangaroo, and if they come to the conclusion that his Majesty’s complexion has been restored through using the stuff they call ‘Wallypug’s Blush,’ don’t say anything to the contrary; it will put them into a good temper and perhaps make them kinder to his Majesty.”
tokens: go tell come conclusion complexion restore use stuff call say contrary put good temper make kinder

paragraph: Mr. Nobody seemed quite to understand and hurried off again. He did not come back, but about half an hour afterwards there was a noise at the door of my cell, and after a great deal of fumbling at the lock, Oom Hi and the Kangaroo entered.
tokens: seem understand hurry come hour be noise door cell great deal fumble lock enter

paragraph: Oom Hi carried a basin and the Kangaroo a bottle of Vimbril, or Wallypug’s Blush, as it was now called.
tokens: carry basin bottle call

paragraph: They looked very amiable, and after some kind remarks about the weather Oom Hi cleared his throat and said in a sort of apologetic voice:
tokens: look amiable kind remark weather clear throat say sort apologetic voice

paragraph: [OOM HI CARRIED A BASIN, AND THE KANGAROO A BOTTLE OF VIMBRIL.]
tokens: carried bottle

paragraph: “Er, we didn’t mean to be _too_ severe, you know, and what we have done has been all for the best. You will be pleased to hear that my invaluable preparation, ‘Wallypug’s Blush,’ has proved perfectly satisfactory, and his Majesty the Wallypug is a living testimony to its worth. His beautiful complexion has entirely returned, and I have no doubt if we could persuade you to use it too it would be equally successful in your case. You will try it, won’t you?” he pleaded earnestly.
tokens: mean severe know do good pleased hear invaluable preparation prove satisfactory living testimony worth beautiful complexion return have doubt persuade use successful case try plead

paragraph: “Of course if my complexion, such as it is, is restored, I shall be released from here?” I hazarded.
tokens: course complexion such restore release hazard

paragraph: “Oh! certainly,” said both animals at once, and so after surreptitiously devouring the remainder of the Gombobble, I permitted the creatures to smear my face over with their precious rubbish on the distinct understanding that I should be allowed to have a good wash afterwards.
tokens: say animal devour remainder permit creature smear face precious rubbish distinct understanding allow have good wash

paragraph: The Gombobble acted perfectly, and the animals were delighted when they saw the result, as they of course put it down to the effect of their “Wallypug’s Blush.”
tokens: act animal delight see result course put effect

paragraph: “Go and fetch the Cockatoo,” said Oom Hi, “she shall judge for herself.”
tokens: go fetch say judge

paragraph: So the Kangaroo went off to fetch her.
tokens: go fetch

paragraph: “Wonderful preparation, isn’t it?” said Oom Hi, gazing affectionately at his bottle of “Wallypug’s Blush.”
tokens: wonderful preparation say gaze bottle

paragraph: “Very!” I remarked.
tokens: remark

paragraph: “I _knew_ it must be good for something or another,” he went on, “but of course we could not tell exactly what till we had tried. It _very nearly_ cured a cold once, you know, when I called it Broncho, though I am bound to admit that it was not exactly a success as Vimbril. Do you think ‘Wallypug’s Blush’ a good title,” he asked anxiously.
tokens: _knew good go course tell try nearly_ cure cold know call bound admit success think good title ask

paragraph: “It’s a very striking one,” I admitted.
tokens: striking one admit

paragraph: “I shall advertise it well in the _Daily Whyer_, you know, and—Oh! here comes the Cockatoo,” he added, as that bird came bustling into the cell.
tokens: advertise daily know come add bird come bustle cell

paragraph: “Now then, what’s this I hear?” she began, giving me a keen glance; “‘Wallypug’s Blush’ restored your complexion. Why so it has, though I cannot say much for it even now. However, since you have no longer a blue face you are scarcely likely to be valuable as a curiosity, so you had better get about your business,” and, flinging open the door, the Cockatoo motioned me out with her crutched stick.
tokens: hear begin give keen glance restore complexion say much have blue face likely valuable curiosity good get business fling open door motion crutched stick

paragraph: You may be sure I was not long in availing myself of my liberty and hurrying to the spot where I had last seen his Majesty.
tokens: sure long avail liberty hurry spot see

paragraph: The stocks were empty, but a little further off I found A. Fish, Esq., who seemed delighted to see me.
tokens: stock empty little find seem delighted see

paragraph: “Well I dever!” he exclaimed; “I heard you were going to be exhibited as a freak. What stories people do tell, to be sure.”
tokens: dever exclaim hear go exhibit freak story person tell sure

paragraph: I briefly explained what had happened and inquired if he knew where the Wallypug was.
tokens: explain happen inquire know

paragraph: “Oh yes, he’s gode back to the Palace,” said A. Fish, Esq. “He’s id a rare way aboudt you.”
tokens: gode say id rare way aboudt

paragraph: So I thought it best, in order to relieve his Majesty’s anxiety, to seek him there.
tokens: think good order relieve anxiety seek

paragraph: It was now getting dusk, and seeing a light in his Majesty’s private apartments, I went up and knocked at the door.
tokens: get dusk see light private apartment go knock door

paragraph: “Come in!” cried a voice which I had no difficulty in recognizing, and on opening the door I found the good little man pacing to and fro in a state of great agitation.
tokens: come cry voice have difficulty recognize open door find good little man pace state great agitation

paragraph: “Oh! it’s you,” he exclaimed in a relieved voice, and came forward to welcome me eagerly. “I was just wondering how on earth I could get you out of the Cockatoo’s clutches; she’s a wretched creature, isn’t she?”
tokens: exclaim relieve voice come welcome wonder earth get clutch wretched creature

paragraph: “Well she is a trial, certainly,” I agreed, “and I think if I were you I should adopt some very strong measures for preventing her from interfering as she does.”
tokens: trial agree think adopt strong measure prevent interfere

paragraph: “Hm! yes,” said his Majesty, “let’s go and hear what the Doctor-in-Law has to say about it; he may be able to advise us as to the best way of putting her down, and though he will probably charge pretty stiffly for it, his advice _is_ worth having sometimes.”
tokens: say let go hear have say able advise good way put charge advice worth have

paragraph: So we went together to the Doctor-in-Law’s room.
tokens: go room

paragraph: We were surprised to hear several voices talking excitedly within, and when in reply to a rather impatient “Come in!” we opened the door, we were astonished to see the Doctor-in-Law in his dressing-gown and slippers, in busy consultation with Oom Hi, the Kangaroo, and the Cockatoo.
tokens: surprise hear several voice talk reply impatient come open door astonished see dress gown slipper busy consultation

paragraph: “I’ve been greatly interested in hearing of the success of ‘Wallypug’s Blush,’” said the little man, “and am just helping Oom Hi (ahem, for a consideration) to draw up a prospectus for turning it into a Limited Company. In consideration of the payment to me of several thousands of pounds, I am about to become a director, and am to be paid several thousands more for persuading the Cockatoo to join the board too.”
tokens: interested hear success say little man help consideration draw prospectus turn limited company consideration payment several thousand pound about become director pay several thousand more persuade join board

paragraph: [We were astonished to see the Doctor-in-Law in his dressing-gown and slippers, in busy consultation with Oom-Hi, the Kangaroo, and the Cockatoo.—Page 184.   _Wallypugland._]
tokens: astonished see dress gown slipper busy consultation page

paragraph: “But,” I objected, “what do you claim that ‘Wallypug’s Blush’ does?”
tokens: object claim

paragraph: “Oh, it restores people with blue complexions to their natural color, you know.”
tokens: restore person blue complexion natural color know

paragraph: “But surely there will be a very limited sale,” I said; “there cannot be very many people with blue faces, you know.”
tokens: be limited sale say be many person blue face know

paragraph: “Oh, _of course_, you must try and spoil everything with your absurd objections,” said the Cockatoo crossly.
tokens: course try spoil absurd objection say

paragraph: “Yes, I really don’t see that your contention has much weight,” said the Doctor-in-Law. “Provided it is only advertised enough, the public will buy _any_ rubbish, whether it does what it professes to do or not. And we shall simply call it ‘Wallypug’s Blush _for the complexion_,’ you know; besides, even if it doesn’t answer, we can turn it into something else, Boot Polish or Hair Wash, you know.”
tokens: see contention have much weight say provide advertise public buy rubbish do profess do call complexion_ know answer turn else know

paragraph: And so seeing them so busily and enthusiastically engaged in the business of drawing up the prospectus, we said good-night and retired to our rooms.
tokens: see engage business draw prospectus say good night retire room
